Reviews.Title: Very Disappointing
Reviews.Author: Dennis Anderson
Reviews.Content: We purchased this camera for our grandson for Christmas and are very disappointed by it all around. Everything is blurry on the viewing screen and sometimes when you turn it on it doesn't work.  We took the batteries out to check them and when we did we lost all of the pictures he had taken.  I am thinking of returning it.

ProductInfo.Features:
Features 3.1MP and 1.5-inch preview screen
Shoots video clips and has PC-web cam capability
Software Included
Auto flash feature
ProductInfo.Name: Vivitar Digital Still Camera (V38-BLUBER-FM)
